description: Successful authentication from an IP that previously had multiple failed attempts
detail: Successful login from 198.51.100.23 after 274 failed attempts
recommended_response: IMMEDIATE: Disable compromised account. Isolate host. Begin IR investigation.

description: Successful authentication from an IP that previously had multiple failed attempts
detail: Successful login from 192.0.2.100 after 140 failed attempts
recommended_response: IMMEDIATE: Disable compromised account. Isolate host. Begin IR investigation.

description: Sudo used to execute high-risk commands (shell spawn, password change, user creation)
recommended_response: IMMEDIATE: Isolate host. Review all commands executed by this user.

description: PowerShell executed with encoded command (-enc flag)
recommended_response: IMMEDIATE: Decode the command. Isolate endpoint. Check for C2 callbacks.

description: PowerShell used to disable security controls (Windows Defender, firewall)
mitre_name: Impair Defenses: Disable or Modify Tools
recommended_response: IMMEDIATE: Re-enable security tools. Isolate endpoint. Full forensic analysis.

description: PowerShell used to download and execute remote scripts
recommended_response: Block the download URL. Isolate endpoint. Scan for payloads.

description: Mimikatz or similar credential dumping tool execution detected
recommended_response: IMMEDIATE: Isolate host. Rotate ALL domain credentials. Check for lateral movement.

description: Successful authentication from an IP that previously had multiple failed attempts
detail: Successful login from 203.0.113.45 after 160 failed attempts
recommended_response: IMMEDIATE: Disable compromised account. Isolate host. Begin IR investigation.

details.failure_reason: The user account has been locked out

description: High volume of DNS queries with unusually long subdomains to a single domain
recommended_response: Block the C2 domain. Isolate the source host. Analyze DNS payloads.

description: Large volume of S3 GetObject requests for sensitive files from external IP
recommended_response: Revoke access credentials. Enable S3 bucket versioning. Review bucket policies.

description: AdministratorAccess or high-privilege policy attached to a user
recommended_response: IMMEDIATE: Detach the policy. Investigate who made the change. Rotate keys.

rule_name: AWS Security Group Opened to World
description: Security group rule allows inbound traffic from 0.0.0.0/0
mitre_name: Impair Defenses: Disable or Modify Cloud Firewall
recommended_response: IMMEDIATE: Revoke the rule. Review all security groups for similar misconfigurations.

description: New cron job created with suspicious command (reverse shell, download)
recommended_response: Review and remove malicious cron entries. Investigate compromised user.

description: Network connection to a known threat intelligence indicator
recommended_response: Block the indicator. Isolate affected hosts. Run full malware scan.

description: Multiple failed Windows logon attempts (Event 4625) from the same source IP
recommended_response: Block source IP. Enable account lockout policies. Review RDP exposure.

details.failure_reason: The specified user does not exist
The user account has been locked out
The user account has been locked out

description: Multiple failed SSH login attempts from the same source IP within a short timeframe
recommended_response: Block source IP at firewall. Rotate credentials for targeted accounts.

description: Multiple failed SSH login attempts from the same source IP within a short timeframe
recommended_response: Block source IP at firewall. Rotate credentials for targeted accounts.

description: Multiple failed SSH login attempts from the same source IP within a short timeframe
recommended_response: Block source IP at firewall. Rotate credentials for targeted accounts.

description: User not in sudoers file attempted to execute command as root
recommended_response: Investigate the user account. Check for lateral movement evidence.

description: New systemd service installed, potential persistence mechanism
mitre_name: Create or Modify System Process: Systemd Service
recommended_response: Review service definition. Check for suspicious ExecStart commands.

description: Multiple failed Windows logon attempts (Event 4625) from the same source IP
recommended_response: Block source IP. Enable account lockout policies. Review RDP exposure.

details.failure_reason: The specified user does not exist
The user account has been locked out

description: Windows Registry Run/RunOnce key modified for persistence
mitre_name: Boot or Logon Autostart Execution: Registry Run Keys
recommended_response: Review the registry value. Remove unauthorized entries. Scan the binary.

rule_name: AWS API Call from Anomalous Region
description: AWS API calls originating from an unusual geographic region
recommended_response: Verify the API calls are authorized. Rotate access keys if unauthorized.

description: New access key created for an IAM user
recommended_response: Verify key creation was authorized. If not, disable the new key immediately.

description: New IAM user created, potential persistence via cloud accounts
recommended_response: Verify user creation was authorized. Check for additional escalation.

rule_name: AWS Assume Role from Unusual Source
description: AssumeRole API call from an unusual IP or with unusual session name
mitre_name: Use Alternate Authentication Material: Application Access Token
recommended_response: Review role trust policies. Verify the session is legitimate.

description: Sensitive secret value retrieved from Secrets Manager
mitre_name: Unsecured Credentials: Cloud Instance Metadata API
recommended_response: Verify secret access was authorized. Rotate the secret if compromised.

description: Console login detected without multi-factor authentication
recommended_response: Enforce MFA for all console access. Investigate the login context.

description: Successful login from an IP outside known internal ranges
recommended_response: Verify if the login is authorized. Check VPN logs for context.
